name: Waste your Land
description:
║ Waste your land is a Game about Sharing. ║

Did I say sharing?
Well... if sharing means manipulating the damn opponent as often as possible
and throwing angry cows at him to gain advantage and enjoy new possessions -
then yes! Then this is about sharing.

This Game is a "2-Player" only Game. If you have no friends, this game cannot help either

║ Description ║

You want to build the highest Tower in the Wasteland of Scrap in the entire Wasteland?! No? Well, this is Awkward...
If you want to delve into deep chaos with the bud next to you anyways, you're just in the right place! Play as Gurl or Deerstalker and waste your land! 

║Controls║

Play together on a single Keyboard. Player 1 (Deerstalker) uses A_D to move, W_S to aim and SPACE to throw, 

while Player 2 (Gurl) uses LEFT_RIGHT to move, UP_DOWN to aim and RIGHT_ENTER to throw.

Throw as much scrap onto your tower as possible in 60 seconds and Win the Game! Whats to win, you ask? Maybe the cows stop mooing for once...

║ Information about the creation ║

This game was created during the 2020 Global Game Jam

Created by 
Julia "Ollosaurus" Gutsmann (Artist)
